alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:52PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gallatin County through 430 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Clyde Park, or 20 miles north of Bozeman, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Gallatin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
